publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2448 Dennis Canavan: Election of First Ministerâ€”That the Parliament agrees that members be given the opportunity to question those nominated for the post of First Minister before the Parliament votes to decide on the successful nominee. Supported by: Mr Murray Tosh*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2448 Election of First Minister (lodged on 14 November 2001) Alex Neil*

S1M-2448 Dennis Canavan: Election of First Minister-That the Parliament agrees that members be given the opportunity to question those nominated for the post of First Minister before the Parliament votes to decide on the successful nominee. Supported by: Mr Murray Tosh, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Robin Harper*
S1M-2448 Election of First Minister (lodged on 14 November 2001) Christine Grahame*, Phil Gallie*
S1M-2448 Election of First Minister (lodged on 14 November 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*
